ygData.subject: Re: Hrmm
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes, it IS possible. I went to Halas through level 15 through 18, and I learned alot about it. I think there is a high level gnome necromancer under the frozen
ygData.messageBody:
Yes, it IS possible. I went to Halas through level 15 through 18, and I
learned alot about it. I think there is a high level gnome necromancer under
the frozen river in Everfrost, but he attackes everyone on site. He has a
few skellie cronies too. I never saw him for myself, so it may not be true.

>Hey guys,
>
>If the clue was to look below waves, and before it was stated that a
>Barbarian Shaman would do the exploring, what about the lake outside of
>Halas? Has that already been brought up? If need be, I can take my
>Magician up there and poke around?
>
>Xalastile
>lvl 22 magician
>xegony
